T02TD2777E:148a-0: @148a * // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2777E:148a-1: gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed na //
T02TD2777E:148a-2: bdag gam gzhan gyi don 'jug pa //
T02TD2777E:148a-3: de tshe shes dang mi shes pas //
T02TD2777E:148a-4: dri ma rab tu mang skye 'gyur //
T02TD2777E:148a-5: de la mgon po spyan ras gzigs //
T02TD2777E:148a-6: thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs pa //
T02TD2777E:148a-7: ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis //
T02TD2777E:148a-8: bkru ba dam pa 'dir bshad do //
T02TD2777E:148a-9: rab tu gnas pa mchog gnas pa'i //
T02TD2777E:148a-10: rten gang byin gyis brlabs pa zhig //
T02TD2777E:148a-11: mdun bdar me tog bdug spas sogs //
T02TD2777E:148a-12: mchod pa du mas legs mchod bya //
T02TD2777E:148a-13: phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs pa yi //
T02TD2777E:148a-14: rgyal ba sras bcas rin chen gsum //
T02TD2777E:148a-15: sprin gyi phung po ltar dkrigs pas //
T02TD2777E:148a-16: nam mkha'i ngos la gang bar blta //
T02TD2777E:148a-17: nyes dmigs rnam pa mang dran pas //
T02TD2777E:148a-18: gdung ba'i yid kyi 'gyod pas ni //
T02TD2777E:148a-19: thog med nas bsags sdig pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2777E:148a-20: ma lus so sor bshags shing bsdam //
T02TD2777E:148a-21: 'gro ba dge ba'i rtsa rnams la //
T02TD2777E:148a-22: rjes su yid byed yi rang ba //
T02TD2777E:148a-23: 'di ni bsam mi khyab pa'i las //
T02TD2777E:148a-24: ming las phun tshogs khyad par 'dod //
T02TD2777E:148a-25: de nas 'phags tshogs spyan sngar bdag / gus pas phyag 'tshal rab dang bas //
T02TD2777E:148a-26: sdig ldan bdag la skyabs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2777E:148a-27: thugs rje chen pos dgongs su gsol//
T02TD2777E:148a-28: gti mug thibs pos non pa bdag / mi bzad sdig pa'i dbang gyur te //
T02TD2777E:148a-29: 'gro ba ngan song nges pa'i sar //
T02TD2777E:148a-30: gdon mi za bar myur ltung 'gyur //
T02TD2777E:148a-31: de bas skyob ba rnams kyi mthus //
T02TD2777E:148a-32: mgon med bdag gi gnas skabs 'di //
T02TD2777E:148a-33: gzigs nas myur du bskyab tu gsol //
T02TD2777E:148b-0: khyed las skyabs gzhan @148b bdag ma mchis //
T02TD2777E:148b-1: de ltar sna tshogs gdungs pa yis //
T02TD2777E:148b-2: smre sngags du mas smre brjod la //
T02TD2777E:148b-3: rtse gcig ma yengs thal sbyar nas //
T02TD2777E:148b-4: re ba'i yid kyis mdun du 'dug / de tshe lha mchog 'dus pa yi //
T02TD2777E:148b-5: tshogs rnams thugs rje'i thugs bskyod de //
T02TD2777E:148b-6: de dag las sprul 'jig rten mgon //
T02TD2777E:148b-8: yang ni mi phyed dad dang dang //
T02TD2777E:148b-9: mchod byas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD2777E:148b-10: de rjes mgon po'i thugs ka nas //
T02TD2777E:148b-12: dbyings 'byin dri ma bsal ba dang //
T02TD2777E:148b-13: bkrus dang yongs su sbyang ba bya //
T02TD2777E:148b-14: de las 'od zer rnon po yis //
T02TD2777E:148b-15: dri ma bsregs pa dang pos te //
T02TD2777E:148b-16: bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun phreng ba yis //
T02TD2777E:148b-17: bkru ba gang yin gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2777E:148b-18: yang dag ye shes mnyam gzhag la //
T02TD2777E:148b-19: mnyam 'jog yongs su sbyong ba bshad //
T02TD2777E:148b-20: dag dang dri med 'od gsal dang //
T02TD2777E:148b-21: sgrub pa las la sbyar ba yis //
T02TD2777E:148b-22: don bsgrub nas ni dkyil 'khor gnyis //
T02TD2777E:148b-23: slar bdag snying gar bsdu bar bya //
T02TD2777E:148b-24: dri ma rnam dag gi cho ga rdzogs so//
